description: Example MCP servers configuration for Agent Zero with Qdrant
usage: Copy the 'mcp_servers' value (as a JSON string) to your tmp/settings.json
mcp_servers_string: [{"name": "qdrant-admin", "description": "Qdrant collection administration and management", "type": "sse", "url": "http://qdrant-mcp-server:8080/sse", "disabled": false}, {"name": "sequential-thinking", "description": "Multi-step reasoning and analysis", "type": "stdio", "command": "npx", "args": ["--yes", "--package", "@modelcontextprotocol/server-sequential-thinking", "mcp-server-sequential-thinking"], "disabled": false}]
